title: Does President Obama still use a Blackberry as his primary cell phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes without question. The security of an iPhone or Galaxy cannot be trusted. A Blackberry can. BlackBerry created the hardware to work with the OS to be unhackable. Ever see a "rooted" or "jailbroke" BlackBerry? Can't be done.  So do you want the leader of our country using a phone the enemies of our country can hack and listen or see what documents he has on his phone? Or use a highly secure and government IT controlled phone? So no he won't be allowed under any circumstances to use an iPhone.

To add on to Thomas Martin's answer, on Jimmy Kimmel, he stated that he uses his blackberry because, as President, he is not allowed to have a phone with a built in microphone. So nobody can listen in on him without his knowledge.
